actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-424, by Mr. Webster.
The resolution waives clause 6(a) of rule XIII requiring a two-thirds vote to consider a report from the Committee on Rules on the same day it is presented to the House.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 123.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 600.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 178 (Roll no. 146).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4281) to provide an extension of Federal-aid highway, highway safety, motor carrier safety, transit, and other programs funded out of the Highway Trust Fund pending enactment of a multiyear law reauthorizing such programs, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4281) to provide an extension of Federal-aid highway, highway safety, motor carrier safety, transit, and other programs funded out of the Highway Trust Fund pending enactment of a multiyear law reauthorizing such programs.
